00001 #ifndef COMMANDS_H
00002 #define COMMANDS_H
00003 
00017 // Common interactive client commands 
00018 
00019 int cmd_quit   (char *, MsgType, char *); // quit the application
00020 int cmd_ping   (char *, MsgType, char *); // ping (comm handshake request)
00021 int cmd_pong   (char *, MsgType, char *); // pong (comm handshake acknowledge)
00022 int cmd_info   (char *, MsgType, char *); // return application runtime info
00023 int cmd_version(char *, MsgType, char *); // return version info
00024 int cmd_verbose(char *, MsgType, char *); // toggle verbose mode
00025 int cmd_debug  (char *, MsgType, char *); // toggle debug (superverbose) mode
00026 int cmd_help   (char *, MsgType, char *); // show command help
00027 int cmd_history(char *, MsgType, char *); // cli history utility
00028 int cmd_status (char *, MsgType, char *); // Report the application status
00029 
00030 // General TCS Commands
00031 
00032 int cmd_tcinit  (char *, MsgType, char *);  // Initialize an TCS client session
00033 int cmd_tcstatus(char *, MsgType, char *);  // Query the TCS for status
00034 int cmd_gettime (char *, MsgType, char *);  // Query time/date only (no TCS info)
00035 int cmd_tcclose (char *, MsgType, char *);  // Close an TCS client session
00036 int cmd_config  (char *, MsgType, char *);  // Print TCS config info (engineering)
00037 int cmd_setturbo(char *, MsgType, char *);  // Set "Turbo" TCS query mode
00038 int cmd_setfull (char *, MsgType, char *);  // [Re]set full TCS query mode (default)
00039 int cmd_authorize(char *, MsgType, char *); // Query the authorization status
00040 int cmd_telpos  (char *, MsgType, char *);  // Just query the current telescope position (subset of tcstatus)
00041 
00042 // Preset and Offset Commands
00043 
00044 int cmd_clear    (char *, MsgType, char *); // Clear all targeting information (ClearStars)
00045 int cmd_objname  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the object ID for the preset
00046 int cmd_objcoords(char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the object coords (RA,Dec)
00047 int cmd_guiname  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the guide star ID
00048 int cmd_guicoords(char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the guide star coords (RA,Dec)
00049 int cmd_rotator  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the telescope rotator angle and mode
00050 int cmd_refwave  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the target reference wavelength (microns)
00051 int cmd_side     (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set/Query the telescope "side" to use (left|right|both)
00052 int cmd_preset   (char *, MsgType, char *); // Issue a telescope preset (LBT-ese for "point")
00053 int cmd_offset   (char *, MsgType, char *); // Issue a telescope offset in celestial coordinates (RADEC)
00054 int cmd_slitoffset(char *, MsgType, char *); // Issue a telescope offset in slit coordinates (DETXY)
00055 int cmd_update   (char *, MsgType, char *); // Update the pointing reference
00056 int cmd_remove   (char *, MsgType, char *); // Remove pointing, offset, and hotspot objects
00057 
00058 // Other IIF Functions
00059 
00060 int cmd_movefoc  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Move the telescope focus (absolute move)
00061 int cmd_stepfoc  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Step the telescope focus (relative move)
00062 int cmd_logevent (char *, MsgType, char *); // Log an instrument "event"
00063 int cmd_setparam (char *, MsgType, char *); // Set a parameter in the Data Dictionary
00064 int cmd_getparam (char *, MsgType, char *); // Get a parameter from the Data Dictionary
00065 int cmd_gpause   (char *, MsgType, char *); // Pause Guiding
00066 int cmd_gresume  (char *, MsgType, char *); // Resume Guiding
00067 
00068 // Application command/action structure
00069 
00074 struct Commands {
00075   char *cmd;        
00076 
00103   int(* action)(char *args, MsgType msgtype, char *reply);  
00104 
00105   char *usage;        
00106   char *description;  
00107 }
00108 cmdtab[] = {   
00109   {"quit"    ,cmd_quit    ,"quit","Terminate the client session"},
00110   {"verbose" ,cmd_verbose ,"verbose","Toggle verbose output mode on/off"},
00111   {"debug"   ,cmd_debug   ,"debug","Toggle super-verbose debugging output mode on/off"},
00112   {"history" ,cmd_history ,"history","Show the command history (console only)"},
00113   {"info"    ,cmd_info    ,"info","Report client session runtime info"},
00114   {"version" ,cmd_version ,"version","Report the client version and compilation time"},
00115   {"iifinit" ,cmd_tcinit  ,"iifinit <proxy instID focStation side>","Initialize the LBT IIF connection"},
00116   {"iifclose",cmd_tcclose ,"iifclose","Close the LBT IIF client connection"},
00117   {"tcstatus",cmd_tcstatus,"tcstatus","Query and report the LBT status"},
00118   {"gettime" ,cmd_gettime ,"gettime","Query and report the UTC date/time (no TCS query)"},
00119   {"telpos"  ,cmd_telpos  ,"telpos","Query for current LBT pointing info (subset of tcstatus)"}, 
00120   {"status"  ,cmd_status  ,"status","Report the current LBT IIF client status"},
00121   {"+turbo"  ,cmd_setturbo,"+turbo","Setup for \"turbo\" query mode (time-only queries)"},
00122   {"-turbo"  ,cmd_setfull ,"-turbo","Restore full TCS query mode"},
00123   {"authorized",cmd_authorize,"authorized","Query the authorization status on the LBT focal station"},
00124   {"clearstars",cmd_clear ,"ClearStars","Clear target and guider coordinates"},
00125   {"objname" ,cmd_objname ,"objname <string>","Set/Query the target object name"},
00126   {"objcoords",cmd_objcoords,"objcoords <ra dec <pmr pmd epoch>>",
00127    "Set/Query the target coordinates (sexagesimal J2000, optional proper motion in mas/year)"},
00128   {"guiname" ,cmd_guiname ,"guiname <string>","Set/Query the guide object name"},
00129   {"guicoords",cmd_guicoords,"guicoords <ra dec <pmr pmd epoch>>",

00131   {"rotator" ,cmd_rotator ,"rotator <pa mode>","Set/Query the instrument rotator angle and mode"},
00132   {"refwave" ,cmd_refwave ,"refwave <lam>","Set/Query the target reference wavelength in microns"},
00133   {"remove"  ,cmd_remove  ,"remove","Remove target, offset, and hotspot objects from the IIF"},

00135   {"preset"  ,cmd_preset  ,"preset [track|guide|active|acquire|static] [side]","Preset (point) the telescope"},
00136   {"offset"  ,cmd_offset  ,"offset dRA dDec dPA mode","Offset the telescope dRA, dDec in arcsec, dPA in degrees, mode=(rel|abs)"},
00137   {"slitoffset",cmd_slitoffset,"slitoffset dX dY dPA mode","Offset the telescope in the slit plane, dY is along the slit, dX,dY in arcsec, dPA in degrees, mode=(rel|abs)"},
00138   {"updatepointing"  ,cmd_update  ,"UpdatePointing [left|right|both]","Update the telescope pointing reference (e.g., after an offset)"},
00139   {"movefocus",cmd_movefoc,"MoveFocus <foc [m1|m2|m1m2]>","Move the telescope focus (absolute)"},
00140   {"stepfocus",cmd_stepfoc,"StepFocus <dfoc [m1|m2|m1m2]>","Step the telescope focus (relative)"},
00141   {"logevent",cmd_logevent ,"LogEvent <name descr>","log an instrument event"},
00142   {"setparameter",cmd_setparam,"SetParameter <DDname value>","Set a parameter in the Data Dictionary"},
00143   {"getparameter",cmd_getparam,"GetParameter <DDname>","Get a parameter from the Data Dictionary"},
00144   {"pauseguiding",cmd_gpause,"PauseGuiding [left|right|both]","Pause guiding temporarily"},
00145   {"resumeguiding",cmd_gresume,"ResumeGuiding [left|right|both]","Resume guiding after PauseGuiding"},

00153   {"gresume"  ,cmd_gresume ,"gresume" ,"alias for ResumeGuiding"},

00163 // Number of commands defined (so we don't have to count correctly)
00164   
00165 int NumCommands = sizeof(cmdtab)/sizeof(struct Commands);
